history.summary: Concept development and furniture design for Optimizing resource utilisation through innovation process.
Project and business managing. In TotemCollective I have strengthened my ability to plan and structure big projects and gained experience in how to turn ideas into practice and products.
Innovation lab I was responsible for developing a new way of using prefabricated concrete in architecture.
Pangea-idea provides companies with brand identity and product design. Started up in San Francisco.

My work at Interactive Spaces included developing new projects that focused on new ways to interact with lifestyle products using the newest technology. The center has clients like B&O, which I mainly worked with.

curriculum: I studied HCI and user experience methods at Chalmers for one semester. In a multidisciplinary group with engineers, computer scientist, fashion designers and architects, we created interactive learning tool for children .

In my master study I worked on an ambitious project called Digital Urban Living. I worked in collaboration with another students and together we mapped the existing ways of connecting with people in urban life, and created a concept by using the city and its life to connect to each other using the city’s environment and new technology.
Technology; data and programming, IT-university Aarhus Joined class with computer scientist from Aarhus University.
Technology, architecture and design, IT-university Aarhus Joined class with computer scientist from Aarhus University.
In my bachelor study I developed a concept for a modular house.

history.organization: Google for Entrepreneurs - Startup Weekend Health Copenhagen
history.summary: All Startup Weekend events follow the same basic model: anyone is welcome to pitch their startup idea and receive feedback from their peers. Teams organically form around the top ideas (as determined by popular vote) and then it’s a 54 hour frenzy of business model creation, coding, designing, and market validation.
Idea maturation, project development and fundrasing

recognition.title: Boblr challenge for Dantoy
recognition.summary: "Thanks Line for participating and for creating such an exciting idea and solution to Dantoy, which was chosen among other very attractive solutions from talented creative professionals around the world.  As Line has proven her high calibre, and you can browse her portfolio here together with Boblr’s other cherry-picked top talents."

testimonials.name: Kim Eskildsen - Senior Project Engineer
testimonials.quote: Første gang man møder Line er hun meget observerende og virker lidt genert, men alligevel med en selvtillid og et selvværd der er let at aflæse. Line har god grund til at have selvtilliden og  Selvværd oppe på 100 %. Hun er Selvstændig, kreativ og udviklende og er derfor en yderst aktiv aktør i kreative grupper. Line har dog også begge ben solidt plantet på jorden så de kreative tanker og ideer også bliver funderet og ført frem.   Bag den smukke ydre ligger der en stærk hjerne der tænker. Dette giver sig udtryk ved at hun kan være stille, men når hun har lyttet kommer der yders kompetent modspil, men alligevel på måde man kun kan have respekt for. Line vinder sine sejre ved at være aktiv lyttende og vel argumenterende på en empatisk måde. Line er en intelligent pige med en stor viden på mange forskellige fronter hvorfor hun er meget alsidig. Line behersker kaos uden at blive stresset, men formår samtidigt at omsætte kaos til struktur.   Jeg har haft fornøjelsen at arbejde kortvarigt sammen med Line i en projektgruppe, hvor gruppens forskelligheder var markante. Her ydede Line en ihærdig indsats og satte sit præg på opgaven.  Line er oprigtig, ærlig, og kompromissøgende i sine debatter og derfor også let at samarbejde med.   Vær god mod Line og giv hende et professionelt og kreativt miljø, og hun vil blomstre og gør den forskel som giver succes.   Jeg kan derfor kun have den største faglige respekt for Line og derfor også på det varmeste anbefale Line til fremtidige opgaver. En person jeg gerne vil arbejde sammen med igen hvis muligheden opstår
